CustomField.description: Bucket size for total raised capital per account
CustomField.formula: IF(PFG_Total_Raised_Capital__c <=50999999,"≤$50M", IF(PFG_Total_Raised_Capital__c <=100999999,"$51M-$100M", IF(PFG_Total_Raised_Capital__c <=200999999,"$101M-$200M", IF(PFG_Total_Raised_Capital__c <=300999999,"$201M-$300M", IF(PFG_Total_Raised_Capital__c <=500999999,"$301M-$500M", IF(PFG_Total_Raised_Capital__c <=999999999,"$501M-$999M", IF(PFG_Total_Raised_Capital__c >=1000000000,"≥$1B","" )))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Bucket size for total raised capital per account
CustomField.label: Bucket Size - Raised Capital by Account
